events.name: ev battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain encompasses various stages and processes crucial for the production and distribution of electric vehicle batteries, including the sourcing of raw materials, manufacturing, and logistics.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain encompasses various stages and processes crucial for the production and distribution of electric vehicle batteries, including the sourcing of raw materials, manufacturing, and logistics.

events.name: permanent magnet supply chain
events.wd_description: The permanent magnet supply chain is critical for EV motors, relying heavily on Nd-Fe-B magnets predominantly produced in China.
events.description: The permanent magnet supply chain is critical for EV motors, relying heavily on Nd-Fe-B magnets predominantly produced in China.

events.name: Fe-B magnets
events.wd_description: Sintered Nd-Fe-B magnets are used in EV motors for their high coercivity and thermal properties, but the supply chain is dominated by China.
events.description: Sintered Nd-Fe-B magnets are used in EV motors for their high coercivity and thermal properties, but the supply chain is dominated by China.

events.name: ernative magnets
events.wd_description: Research into alternative magnets like La-Nd aims to reduce reliance on traditional Nd-Fe-B magnets.
events.description: Research into alternative magnets like La-Nd aims to reduce reliance on traditional Nd-Fe-B magnets.

events.name: mining
events.wd_description: China leads in global REE mining, accounting for over 58% of global REE production.
events.description: China leads in global REE mining, accounting for over 58% of global REE production.

events.name: refining
events.wd_description: China controls 90% of global REE refining, significantly influencing global markets through policies and production decisions.
events.description: China controls 90% of global REE refining, significantly influencing global markets through policies and production decisions.

events.name: EV battery metals supply chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain for critical battery metals like lithium, cobalt, and nickel faces increasing demand and constraints.
events.description: The supply chain for critical battery metals like lithium, cobalt, and nickel faces increasing demand and constraints.

events.name: hium supply chain
events.wd_description: The lithium supply chain is essential for EV batteries, with increasing demand driving the need for efficient sourcing and production.
events.description: The lithium supply chain is essential for EV batteries, with increasing demand driving the need for efficient sourcing and production.

events.name: alt supply chain
events.wd_description: Cobalt supply faces challenges due to political instability in mining countries and a concentrated supply market.
events.description: Cobalt supply faces challenges due to political instability in mining countries and a concentrated supply market.

events.name: kel supply chain
events.wd_description: Nickel is a crucial component for EV batteries, with supply constraints impacting production.
events.description: Nickel is a crucial component for EV batteries, with supply constraints impacting production.

events.name: EV traction motor technologies
events.wd_description: Developing alternative EV traction motor technologies is essential to reduce reliance on rare earth elements and cobalt.
events.description: Developing alternative EV traction motor technologies is essential to reduce reliance on rare earth elements and cobalt.

events.name: -permanent magnet motors
events.wd_description: Technologies such as induction or switched reluctance motors provide alternatives to permanent magnet motors.
events.description: Technologies such as induction or switched reluctance motors provide alternatives to permanent magnet motors.

events.name: ernative permanent magnet motors
events.wd_description: Permanent magnet motors that do not rely heavily on REEs or cobalt are being developed to meet future demand.
events.description: Permanent magnet motors that do not rely heavily on REEs or cobalt are being developed to meet future demand.

events.name: cobalt and REE resource management
events.wd_description: Effective management of cobalt and REE resources is critical to ensure sustainable supply for EV production.
events.description: Effective management of cobalt and REE resources is critical to ensure sustainable supply for EV production.
